title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4029.6 - Overnight races except handicaps
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4029.6 - Overnight races except handicaps

State Regulations

In all overnight races except handicaps not more than
eight pounds may be deducted from the scale of weights for age, except for
allowances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4029.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
